It ensures all components receive stable power supply, enabling your system to tackle any challenge with ease.

80 PLUS STANDARD

The MSI MAG A500DN 500W Power Supply has an 80 PLUS Standard certification, guaranteeing energy efficiency and 80% efficiency, leading to improved system performance and reduced power consumption. The active PFC design enhances power output efficiency and creates a stable environment for other PC components to function optimally.

120mm Low Noise Fan

The MAG A500DN is equipped with protection mechanisms to safeguard the unit and ensure comprehensive protection. It can handle maximum loads in temperatures up to 40°C, making it resilient in various environmental conditions. The 120mm low-noise fan ensures efficient heat dissipation while keeping noise levels to a minimum.

Flat Cable Equipment

The MAG A500DN comes with essential connectors, including 20+4 PIN for motherboard, 4+4 PIN for CPU, 6+2 PIN for PCIe, 5 SATA connectors, 2 MOLEX connectors, and 1 FDD connector. With industrial-level protection and its active PFC design, the MSI MAG A500DN offers a reliable and efficient power solution for your gaming system.

full_description:
MSI MPG A650GF 650W 80 Plus Gold Full Modular Power Supply

The MSI MPG A650GF 650W Power Supply is a powerhouse able to support even the latest graphics card and provide an abundant source of dedicated power. The power supply is rated with an 80 Plus Gold rating that has a power supply efficiency of above 90%. The capacitors used in the MSI MPG A650GF 650W Power Supply are all Japanese that are able to withstand 105Â° C temperature.  It enables the power supply to provide the cleanest of power without any hiccups. The connecting plugs have copper connector terminals to improve the flow of current rapidly and efficiently without any loss.

Support for All

The MPG gaming power supply can support the NVIDIA GeForce RTXâ„¢ 30/20 Series and AMD GPUs. Prepared for the highest of requirements, the MPG power supplyâ€™s IO supports can support different and versatile ways of connection according to the power connector design of different graphics cards.

Only Power Supply You Need

Organizing cables are often the most bothersome part of building a PC. With the MPG gaming power supplyâ€™s fully modular design, it means that only the connectors required by the build need to be used, significantly reducing cable clutter and simplifying the systemâ€™s overall build.

Best Managed PC

All of the MPG gaming power supply cables are flat and in black. The flat cables make cable management easier and less of a headache! Thanks to the flat cables, the entire system can be more organized and has more room for unobstructed airflow. Use the cables you need, and store the rest in the included cable bag.

High Rate of Power Delivery

The MPG gaming power supplyâ€™s 160mm-long and 150mm-wide dimensions ensure a comfortable and easy fit in most PC cases, effectively providing more space for cable management and airflow to the rest of the system.

full_description:
MSI MPG A850G PCIE5 850W 80 Plus Gold Full Modular Power Supply

The MSI MPG A850G PCIE5 is a high-performance power supply designed to meet the demanding needs of gaming and high-end computing systems. With a power output of 850W, this power supply offers sufficient capacity to handle the power-hungry components of modern PCs, including the latest Nvidia GeForce RTX 40 Series graphics cards. Whether you're a hardcore gamer, content creator, or a professional seeking maximum performance, this power supply is built to deliver stable and reliable power to your system. The power supply is optimized to handle the power requirements of Nvidia's latest RTX 40 Series graphics cards, ensuring smooth performance and stability during intense gaming or resource-intensive tasks. The fully modular design allows for a clean and organized installation since you only need to connect the cables that are necessary for your specific system configuration. This helps to reduce cable clutter and improve airflow within the PC case. The use of flat cables not only contributes to tidy cable management but also facilitates easier cable routing, making the installation process more straightforward. The power supply boasts an 80 Plus Gold certification, signifying its high energy efficiency. This certification ensures that the power supply operates with minimum energy wastage, reducing electricity costs and environmental impact. All the capacitors used in this power supply are of Japanese origin and rated for a high operating temperature of 105 degrees Celsius. This choice of capacitors enhances the power supply's reliability and lifespan. The Active Power Factor Correction (PFC) design helps to stabilize the input voltage and improve power efficiency. It ensures that the power supply can deliver smooth and constant power to your components. The power supply comes equipped with multiple protection mechanisms, including Over Voltage Protection (OVP), Over Current Protection (OCP), Over Power Protection (OPP), Over Temperature Protection (OTP), Short Circuit Protection (SCP), and Under Voltage Protection (UVP). These safety features safeguard your PC components from potential damage caused by electrical faults or fluctuations. The power supply utilizes a sophisticated LLC Half Bridge Topology combined with a DC-DC module design. This topology efficiently regulates power conversion, reduces energy loss, and provides a stable power output. The MSI MPG A850G PCIE5 is a reliable and high-performance power supply suitable for enthusiasts and professionals who demand top-notch performance and stability from their PCs. Its advanced features, high efficiency, and robust protection mechanisms make it an excellent choice for powering modern gaming and computing systems.

MSI MAG A850GL PCIE5 850W 80 Plus Gold Full Modular Power Supply

The MSI MAG A850GL PCIE5 850W power supply designed for professionals and gamers who demand nothing less than the best, is an example of modern engineering and design. This device can readily handle even the most power-hungry PC systems, notably those with the newest multi-GPU configurations, thanks to its potent 850W power delivery. What sets it apart is its completely modular architecture, which not only allows builders to use only the connections they need to produce a neat and organized structure but also enhances the airflow throughout the chassis with the inclusion of flat cables. This PSU, which has an 80 PLUS Gold certification, promises up to 90% efficiency under ordinary loads. Over time, this will result in less heat production, quieter operation, and cheaper operating expenses. With its native PCIe 5.0 connection and ATX 3.0 compatibility, it is a future-proof design that is perfect for systems running the newest NVIDIA GeForce RTX 40 Series graphics cards along with other cutting-edge components. A 120mm Fluid Dynamic Bearing fan skillfully handles cooling, offering the best possible trade-off between noise abatement and thermal efficiency. Comprehensive industrial-level protections, such as Over Voltage Protection (OVP), Over Current Protection (OCP), Over Power Protection (OPP), Over Temperature Protection (OTP), Short Circuit Protection (SCP), and Under Voltage Protection (UVP), are also included with the MSI MAG A850GL PCIE5 850W PSU. These measures guarantee the longevity and safety of the power supply as well as the components it powers. Its performance is further enhanced by the addition of an LLC Full Bridge Topology and a DC-DC module architecture, which provide unmatched power stability and efficiency under various loads. The MSI MAG A850GL PCIE5 850W 80 Plus Gold Full Modular Power Supply is a fantastic option for anybody wishing to construct or upgrade to a high-end PC setup because of its feature set, which guarantees dependability, efficiency, and the ability to accommodate the most recent technological developments.

MSI MPG A1000G PCIE5 1000W 80 Plus Gold Full Modular Power Supply

The MSI MPG A1000G PCIE5 is a powerful and reliable power supply unit designed to meet the demanding needs of high-performance gaming and computing systems. With its 1000W output capacity, it can handle even the most power-hungry components, making it an excellent choice for enthusiasts and gamers alike. This power supply is specifically optimized to support the latest Nvidia GeForce RTXTM 40 Series graphics cards, ensuring smooth and stable performance during intense gaming sessions or GPU-intensive tasks. The full modular design of the A1000G allows for easy cable management, as it enables users to connect only the necessary cables, reducing clutter and improving airflow within the PC case. Additionally, the inclusion of flat cables further facilitates cable routing, making the installation process cleaner and more convenient. This power supply is its 80 Plus Gold certification, which signifies high efficiency. It operates with minimal power wastage, converting a significant portion of the input power into usable output power. This not only reduces electricity bills but also helps keep the system running cooler by minimizing heat generation. The MSI MPG A1000G PCIE5 is built with 100% all Japanese 105° C capacitors, which are known for their robust performance and longevity, even under heavy load conditions. The active PFC (Power Factor Correction) design further improves power efficiency and stability. Safety is a top priority in the design of this power supply. It features an industrial-level protection suite, which includes safeguards like Over Voltage Protection (OVP), Over Current Protection (OCP), Over Power Protection (OPP), Over Temperature Protection (OTP), Short Circuit Protection (SCP), and Under Voltage Protection (UVP). These protections shield the components and the entire system from potential damage in case of voltage fluctuations or abnormal power conditions. The MSI MPG A1000G PCIE5 utilizes an LLC Half Bridge Topology with DC-DC module design. This advanced topology helps enhance power efficiency and performance while reducing energy loss during power conversion processes. The DC-DC module design ensures a stable and precise distribution of power to various components, contributing to overall system stability and performance. The MSI MPG A1000G PCIE5 is a feature-rich and high-performance power supply unit that caters to the needs of power-hungry systems, especially those equipped with the latest Nvidia GeForce RTXTM 40 Series graphics cards. Its 80 Plus Gold certification, fully modular design, Japanese capacitors, and extensive protection mechanisms make it a reliable choice for demanding users seeking exceptional efficiency and stability in their PC builds.

full_description:
MSI MEG Ai1300P PCIE5 1300W 80 Plus Platinum Fully Modular Power Supply

The MSI MEG Ai1300P PCIE5 1300W Power Supply, is a cutting-edge solution designed to meet the power demands of high-performance gaming and computing systems. This power supply is engineered to deliver outstanding performance, efficiency, and reliability to ensure your system operates at its best. The MSI MEG Ai1300P features full support for Nvidia GeForce RTXTM 40 Series graphics cards, making it an excellent choice for gamers and content creators looking to harness the power of the latest GPU technology. With ATX 3.0 support, this power supply is compatible with a wide range of motherboards, ensuring seamless integration into your system setup. The PCIe 5.0 readiness and native 16-pin connector guarantee high-speed data transfer and efficient power delivery to the latest PCIe 5.0 compatible devices. This power supply is its software synchronization capability with MSI Center. Through the MSI Center software, you can monitor and control various aspects of your system, including power usage and efficiency, providing an optimized and efficient computing experience. The fully modular design allows for easy cable management, enabling you to use only the cables you need, reducing clutter, and improving airflow within your case. Moreover, the inclusion of sleeve cables adds a touch of style to your build while maintaining a clean and organized appearance. The MSI MEG Ai1300P boasts an 80 PLUS Platinum certification, ensuring that it operates at high-efficiency levels, converting more power from the outlet into usable energy for your components. This not only reduces electricity consumption but also minimizes heat output, leading to quieter and cooler operation. Reliability is a priority, and this power supply delivers 100% Japanese 105°C capacitors and an Active PFC (Power Factor Correction) design, enhancing stability and longevity. Additionally, the power supply features an industrial-level protection system with OVP (Over Voltage Protection), OCP (Over Current Protection), OPP (Over Power Protection), OTP (Over Temperature Protection), SCP (Short Circuit Protection), and UVP (Under Voltage Protection). These protections safeguard your components from potential damage caused by electrical anomalies. The implementation of an LLC Half Bridge Topology with DC-DC module design ensures precise and efficient power delivery to your components, contributing to overall system stability and performance. The MSI MEG Ai1300P PCIE5 1300W 80 Plus Platinum Fully Modular Power Supply is a premium choice for enthusiasts and professionals seeking a reliable and high-performance power solution for their gaming and computing systems. With its top-notch features and advanced technologies, it sets a new standard for power supplies in the market.
